template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Environmental Agency Package!

This package is designed to support environmental agencies and consulting firms in optimizing operations, managing projects, and assessing environmental impact with clarity and credibility. Whether conducting carbon footprint analyses, developing sustainability strategies, or guiding organizations in reducing their environmental impact, it enhances overall efficiency and decision-making.

With this module, you can manage opportunities, structure sustainability projects, track consultancy hours, and organize key reports. Features like CRM, Project, and Timesheet simplify daily tasks, while Appointment allows clients to book demos with ease.
Let's get started to see the change you want to see in the world! üåç

h3.strong: Manage leads and client relationships with CRM

template.p: Track potential clients and manage interactions effectively.

ol.li: Open the CRM App, create a new lead for an organization interested in sustainability services, and assign the lead to a team member.
Log meetings, calls, and emails directly in the CRM. Use the pipeline to track the progress of each lead (e.g., New ‚Üí Internal Analysis ‚Üí Qualified ‚Üí Proposal ‚Üí Won).
Once a lead shows interest, generate a quotation in the Sales App offering services like strategy consulting, carbon footprint assessments, or ESG reporting.

template.p: Structure your work efficiently with Project & Documents Apps.

ol.li: Create a new project (e.g., "Client X ‚Äì ESG Reporting") in theProject App or open the existing one linked to the confirmed quotation.
Manage tasks by organizing them into stages such as 'To Do,' 'In Progress,' and 'Done,' while collaborating with the team by assigning deadlines and responsibilities.
Upload key documents, such as client reports and regulatory guidelines, directly into the dedicated project folder, accessible via the smart button on the project page or in the Document App.

h3.strong: Track billable hours for consulting services

template.p: Ensure accurate invoicing and productivity tracking.

ol.li: Use the timer functionality to track time spent on a specific client case.
Manually add a new line to register time on specific tasks if needed.
Access the Timesheet app via the smart button on the project page to view timesheets related to the project or a specific task.
Link timesheets to invoices in the Sales App, generate the invoice based on recorded time, and send it to the client.

div.p: Use reporting to analyse time spent on different service categories (e.g., strategy consulting, carbon footprint calculations).

h3.strong: Allow clients to book demos online

template.p: Simplify client engagement with the Appointment App.

ol.li: Open the Appointment App and configure available slots for demos.
Share a booking link on your website (via the Website App) so clients can schedule a demo at their convenience.
Set up automated email confirmations and reminders to ensure clients are notified of their booked demo and any changes.
